turns.content: write some questions couples can ask each other to get to know each other more intimately

1. What do you value most in a relationship?
2. What are your goals and aspirations?
3. How do you like to spend your free time?
4. What do you look for in a partner?
5. What do you find most attractive about me?
6. What is your idea of a perfect date?
7. What is your love language?
8. How do you handle conflict in a relationship?
9. What are your relationship deal-breakers?
10. What do you appreciate most about our relationship?

1. What is your biggest turn-on in the bedroom?
2. What is your favorite type of intimacy?
3. What is your wildest sexual fantasy?
4. What is your favorite way to be touched?
5. What is the hottest thing someone has ever said to you in bed?
6. Have you ever had a threesome or considered one?
7. What is your favorite position and why?
8. Have you ever tried role-playing or light BDSM?
9. What is your opinion on sex toys and props?
10. What is your opinion on experimenting with different types of sex, such as oral or anal?
